history.proof: intros Hqcoh. unfold qcoh in Hqcoh. destruct Hqcoh as [Hcoh0 Hvalid Hdom HlocalCoh]. apply Hvalid.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Data: Type
nodes: seq nat
serialize: Data -> seq nat
deserialize: seq nat -> Data
ds_inverse: left_inverse serialize deserialize
d: dstatelet

Goal:
qcoh d -> valid (dstate d)

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
qcoh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), valid (dstate d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes & forall n : [ordType of nid], n \in dom (dstate d) -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
left_inverse = fun (A B : Type) (op : A -> B) (inv : B -> A) => forall x : A, inv (op x) = x : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> (B -> A) -> Prop Arguments left_inverse {A B}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
Notation seq := list
Notation valid := valid
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
pred0v2 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dsoup d)
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Actions.send_act_safe : world -> forall p : protocol, nid -> Label -> send_trans (coh p) -> seq nat -> nid -> state -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
Actions.send_act_step : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) (s1 : state), Actions.send_act_safe W this l st msg to s1 -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
sorted : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> bool
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
sorted_oleq : forall (T : ordType) (s : seq T), sorted ord s -> sorted oleq s
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
sorted_last_key_max : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> oleq x (last y s)
UM.dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (p : pred K), UM.base V p -> seq K
sorted_max_key_last : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> (forall z : A, z \in s -> oleq z x) -> last y s = x
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Msg : forall mtype : Type, mtype -> nat -> nat -> bool -> msg mtype
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Arguments last {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
path = fun (T : Type) (e : rel T) => fix path (x : T) (p : seq T) {struct p} : bool := match p with | [::] => true | y :: p' => e x y && path y p' end : forall T : Type, rel T -> T -> seq T -> bool Arguments path {T}%type_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
seq_last_in : forall (A : eqType) (s : seq A) (x : A), last x s \notin s -> s = [::]
sub_path : forall (T : Type) (e e' : rel T), subrel e e' -> forall (x : T) (p : seq T), path e x p -> path e' x p
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
addn = nosimpl addn_rec : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments addn (_ _)%nat_scope
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
FinMap : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (seq_of : seq (K * V)), sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of] -> finMap K V
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope

``` 
intros Hqcoh. unfold qcoh in Hqcoh. intros. destruct Hqcoh as [Hcoh0 Hvalid Hdom HlocalCoh]. apply Hvalid.
